entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Carlyle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
